Michigan State University's Official Hackathon

SpartaHack VI

Live by the code

Jan. 24-26, 2020

The weekend of January 24th we're bringing students of all skill levels and disciplines together with tech industry professionals at Michigan State University. Each year we provide a space to get creative with tech, make connections, and forget the words "I can't."

We're excited to see what you will create!

See Past Projects & Prizes!

Sponsor SpartaHack

Our sponsors make it possible for our annual event to host 1,000+ emerging developers, designers, and builders. Those who contribute to the event have the opportunity to help guide next generation of tech workers.
